doc.title: Izilungiselelo zomhlaba jikelele
doc.checkedUseSetting: Hlola ukuze unike amandla lesi silungiselelo.
doc.excludeDomains: Engeza amagama wesizinda ukuba akhishwe Lilodwa kuphela igama lesizinda kungenziwa wanezela ngesikhathi.

example.domain: Ungakwazi ukwengeza igama lesizinda, elifana ne-{{url}}, ukuze ukhiphe lonke igama lesizinda.
example.url: Ungakhipha izixhumanisi ezithile ngokungeza isixhumanisi, esifana ne-{{url}}.
example.glob: Ungangeza iphethini ye-{{glob}}, efana ne-{{minimatch}}, ukuze uthole ukufanisa okungaqondakali.

doc.script: Ungasebenzisa futhi imibhalo ye-js ukuze uzuze ukulawula okuyinkimbinkimbi.
doc.checkedUseScript: Ukuthi uvumela iskripthi sakho, qaphela ukuthi udinga ukuthikha womabili amabhokisi ngesikhathi esisodwa ukuze unike iskripthi amandla.

example1.commentTitle: Okwamanje kuwebhusayithi ye-{{youtube}}, udinga ukuvula ikhasi le-{{youtube}} {{watch}} noma {{shorts}} kuthebhu entsha.
example1.page: : Okuguquguqukayo into ye-URL yekhasi lewebhu lamanje Ukuze uthole imininingwane, Sicela ubone
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Igama lesizinda elifanayo. Qaphela ukuthi nakuba amagama esizinda se-{{youtube}} kanye ne-{{families}} kokubili {{mainDomain}}, amagama esizinda esincane athi {{youtubeSubDomain}} kanye nokuthi {{ familiesSubDomain}} Ngakho amagama abo esizinda ahlukile.
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} indlela yokufanisa, kusetshenziswa ilabhulali ye-{{minimatch}}, indlela yokusebenzisa Sicela Bona, noma ungasesha indlela yokusebenzisa i-{{glob}}.
example1.wholeCode: Incazelo yayo yonke ikhodi ukuthi okwamanje ekhasini lesizinda se-{{www}} le-YouTube, uma isixhumanisi esichofoziwe siyigama lesizinda elifanayo futhi indlela iqala ngokuthi {{watch}} noma {{shorts}}, bese kuba ithebhu entsha. ikhasi kwesokudla lizoba Vula.
